mapper.insert: insert into user (userid, email, name, imgurl, usertype) values( #{userid}, #{email}, #{name}, #{imgurl}, #{usertype} )
mapper.update: update teacher set subject = #{subject}, office = #{office} where teacherid = #{teacherid}
mapper.insert: insert into faq (faqid, teacherid, question, answer) values( #{faqid}, #{teacherid}, #{question}, #{answer} )
mapper.select: select u.userid, u.email, u.name, u.imgurl, u.usertype from user u join teacher t on u.userid = t.teacherid where concat(u.email, '/', u.name, '/', ifnull(t.subject, ''), '/', ifnull(t.office, '')) like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
select * from user where usertype = 'STUDENT' and concat(email, '/', name) like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
